name: Jump Or Kill
description:
How long can you run? And how quickly will you die?
You can answer these questions only if you try to run through the entire forest, killing enemies on the way and dodging obstacles.
Buy upgrades for in-game currency to break your record and run even faster, or... fly into the sky?

Run... always run.

The game is waiting for you:
- endless run on three lines
- pleasant soundtrack
- intuitive controls
- enemies
- traps
- improvements
- and soon skins and weapons (possibly skins on weapons =))

Christmas event:
- celebration atmosphere
- Christmas currency - snowballs!
- exclusive skins (coming soon)
- exclusive weapons (coming soon)

Version 0.1.4:

- Fixed a bug due to which you could not respawn for watching ads -_-

- Now the game is FREE FOREVER!
